verses.verse: Then Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH4872> Though Moses and Samuel<WH8050> stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> me,<WH5315> yet my mind would not be toward this people:<WH5971> cast them out<WH7971> of my sight,<WH6440> and let them go forth.<WH3318>

It shall happen,<WH559> when they tell you,<WH3318> Where shall we go forth? Then you shall tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says Yahweh:<WH3068> Such as are for death,<WH4194> to death;<WH4194> and such as are for the sword,<WH2719> to the sword;<WH2719> and such as are for the famine,<WH7458> to the famine;<WH7458> and such as are for captivity,<WH7628> to captivity.<WH7628>

I will appoint<WH6485> over them four<WH702> kinds,<WH4940> says<WH5002> Yahweh:<WH3068> the sword<WH2719> to kill,<WH2026> and the dogs<WH3611> to tear,<WH5498> and the birds<WH5775> of the sky,<WH8064> and the animals<WH929> of the earth,<WH776> to devour<WH398> and to destroy.<WH7843>

I will cause<WH5414> them to be tossed<WH2189> back and forth among all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth,<WH776> because<WH1558> of Manasseh,<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Hezekiah,<WH3169> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> for that which he did<WH6213> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
For who will have pity<WH2550> on you,<WH3389> Jerusalem? or who will bemoan<WH5110> you?<WH5493> or who will turn aside to ask<WH7592> of your welfare?<WH7965>

You have rejected<WH5203> me,<WH5002> says Yahweh,<WH3068> you have gone<WH3212> backward:<WH268> therefore have I stretched out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> against you,<WH7843> and destroyed you;<WH3811> I am weary with repenting.<WH5162>

I have winnowed<WH2219> them with a fan<WH2219> in the gates<WH8179> of the land;<WH776> I have bereaved<WH7921> them of children,<WH6> I have destroyed my people;<WH5971> they didn't<WH7725> return from their ways.<WH1870>

Their widows<WH490> are increased<WH6105> to me above the sand<WH2344> of the seas;<WH3220> I have brought<WH935> on them against the mother<WH517> of the young men<WH970> a destroyer<WH7703> at noonday:<WH6672> I have caused anguish<WH6597> and terrors<WH928> to fall<WH5307> on her suddenly.<WH6597>

She who has borne<WH3205> seven<WH7651> languishes;<WH535> she has given up<WH5301> the spirit;<WH5315> her sun<WH8121> is gone<WH935> down while it was yet day;<WH3119> she has been disappointed<WH954> and confounded:<WH2659> and their residue<WH7611> will I deliver<WH5414> to the sword<WH2719> before<WH6440> their enemies,<WH341> says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Woe<WH188> is me,<WH517> my mother, that you have borne<WH3205> me a man<WH376> of strife<WH7379> and a man<WH376> of contention<WH4066> to the whole earth!<WH776> I have not lent,<WH5383> neither have men<WH5383> lent to me;<WH7043> yet everyone of them curses me.

Yahweh<WH3068> said,<WH559> Most certainly<WH3808> I will strengthen<WH2896> you for good;<WH8281> most certainly<WH518> I will cause the enemy<WH341> to make supplication<WH6293> to you in the time<WH6256> of evil<WH7451> and in the time<WH6256> of affliction.<WH6869>
Can one break<WH7489> iron,<WH1270> even iron<WH1270> from the north,<WH6828> and brass?<WH5178>
Your substance<WH2428> and your treasures<WH214> will I give<WH5414> for a spoil<WH957> without price,<WH4242> and that for all your sins,<WH2403> even in all your borders.<WH1366>
I will make them to pass<WH5674> with your enemies<WH341> into a land<WH776> which you don't<WH3045> know; for a fire<WH784> is kindled<WH6919> in my anger,<WH639> which shall burn on you.<WH3344>

Yahweh,<WH3068> you know;<WH3045> remember<WH2142> me,<WH6485> and visit me,<WH5358> and avenge me of my persecutors;<WH7291> don't<WH3947> take me away in your longsuffering:<WH639> know<WH3045> that for your sake I have suffered<WH5375> reproach.<WH2781>

Your words<WH1697> were found,<WH4672> and I ate<WH398> them;<WH1697> and your words were to me a joy<WH8342> and the rejoicing<WH8057> of my heart:<WH3824> for I am called<WH7121> by your name,<WH8034> Yahweh,<WH3068> God<WH430> of Armies.<WH6635>

I didn't<WH3427> sit in the assembly<WH5475> of those who make merry,<WH7832> nor rejoiced;<WH5937> I sat<WH3427> alone<WH910> because<WH6440> of your hand;<WH3027> for you have filled<WH4390> me with indignation.<WH2195>

Why is my pain<WH3511> perpetual,<WH5331> and my wound<WH4347> incurable,<WH605> which refuses<WH3985> to be healed?<WH7495> Will you indeed be to me as a deceitful<WH391> brook,<WH4325> as waters that fail?<WH539>

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> If you return,<WH7725> then will I bring you again,<WH7725> that you may stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me;<WH3318> and if you take forth the precious<WH3368> from the vile,<WH2151> you shall be as my mouth:<WH6310> they shall return<WH7725> to you,<WH7725> but you shall not return to them.

I will make<WH5414> you to this people<WH5971> a fortified<WH1219> bronze<WH5178> wall;<WH2346> and they shall fight<WH3898> against you,<WH3201> but they shall not prevail against you;<WH3467> for I am with you to save you and to deliver<WH5337> you,<WH5002> says Yahweh.<WH3068>
I will deliver<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of the wicked,<WH7451> and I will redeem<WH6299> you out of the hand<WH3709> of the terrible.<WH6184>
